!
! Extreme Networks VOSS SPBM/Fabric Connect Configuration
! VSP 7200 Series
!
snmp-server name "vsp-spbm-01"
!
! SPBM B-VIDs (Backbone VLANs)
vlan create 4051 type spbm-bvlan
vlan create 4052 type spbm-bvlan
!
! Customer VLANs with I-SIDs
vlan create 100 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 200 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 300 type port-mstprstp 0
!
! I-SID Configuration (Service Instance IDs)
vlan i-sid 100 10100
vlan i-sid 200 10200
vlan i-sid 300 10300
!
! SPBM Instance Configuration
spbm 1 b-vid 4051-4052 primary 4051
spbm 1 nick-name 1.00.01
spbm 1 sys-id 00:bb:00:00:00:01
!
! ISIS Router Configuration for SPBM
router isis
   spbm 1
   spbm 1 b-vid 4051-4052 primary 4051
   spbm 1 nick-name 1.00.01
   system-id 0000.0000.0001
   manual-area 49.0001
   no shutdown
exit
!
! ISIS Interface Configuration
interface GigabitEthernet 1/49
   isis
   isis spbm 1
   isis enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/50
   isis
   isis spbm 1
   isis enable
   no shutdown
exit
!
! CFM Configuration (Connectivity Fault Management)
cfm spbm mip all-bvids
cfm spbm level 4
cfm enable
!
